entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. High plus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers late this afternoon. Snow level 1900 metres. High plus 4. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Flurries or rain showers. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: A few rain showers changing to a few flurries this evening. Snow level 2000 metres lowering to valley bottom this evening. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Tuesday 18 April 2023
